about.description: Hi, I am 20 years old System and Computing Engineer student with additional studies in Enterprise Management and Germany Language and Culture. I live in Bogotá, Colombia and study at University of Los Andes, here I am coursing my third academic year and I expect to graduate in 2020.
about.subdescription: Now days, I have great interest in Machine Learning, mainly in Deep Learning projects. Also interested in business architecture, projects oriented to IT and transactional systems.
about.subsubdescription: I recognize my self as a person that love to learn every aspect of life, from any kind of history to my professional career subjects. I really like to make sport all time, mostly Squash. I make part of the National Squash Federation and my university Squash Team.

workExperience.description: Working in a PhD project based on Business Process Simulating with Deep Learning
Worked as assistant towards a PhD project that involves Tensor Flow, deep learning and repository data mining.
Grade, give feedback and support to students in the following courses: Data Structures, Algorithms and Object-oriented programming and Intro to Systems Engineering.
Member of the local ACM Chapter.

projects.name: Colmines
projects.description: IoT application aimed at preventing health issues and increasing productivity in mines by monitoring different environmental variables and activating control systems as necessary.
projects.technologies: Python, Django, Auth0, Kafka, ZooKeeper, Mosquitto, Node-red, Cassandra, Arduino.

projects.name: FestivAndes. Transactional System
projects.description: Implemented the back-end of a transactional application that can handle the persistence and distributed access to large amounts of data from an event company.
projects.technologies: Oracle SQL, Java, WildFly, RabbitMQ, JMS

projects.name: Habitaciones-FullStackApp
projects.description: Carried out the software development life cycle to implement a fully functional RESTful web application that handles the operations of home rentals companies.
projects.technologies: JavaScript, Java, EJBs, Angular, JQuery, HTML, CSS, JaxRS, Maven, Jenkins.

hobbies.name: Family
hobbies.caption: The most grateful thing in life for me is to spend some quality time in family.

hobbies.name: Apple
hobbies.caption: I am a hugh fan of Apple Company.

hobbies.name: Dream Germany
hobbies.caption: Mein Großer Traum ist Deutschland besuche.
